root.name: Thunder Wolves
root.description: OverviewThunder Wolves is an air-vehicular action shooter, developed by Most Wanted Entertainment for the PC, Xbox Live Arcade, and PlayStation Network platforms. Originally announced with Ubisoft as publisher, it ended up coming out under bitComposer Games instead when the publishing giant dropped the title.The game also features a local co-operative gameplay.PC System SettingsMinimum:OS:Windows® XP/Vista/7™Processor:2 GHz single-coreMemory:2 GB RAMGraphics:256MB DirectX9 compatible video cardDirectX®:9.0cHard Drive:2 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX 9.0c compatibleOther Requirements:Broadband Internet connectionAdditional:Mouse. Local co-op multiplayer requires one game controller.
